title: Easy banana muffins
ingredients: ['200g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 pinch salt', '3 large bananas', '75g butter, melted', '1 egg', '120g caster sugar', '30g light muscovado sugar', '10g chocolate, melted (optional for decoration)']
